messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] across the street
messages.msgSnippet: ... **Don t I WISH!  **~Kelly Yeah,  I was thinking the same thing,  (even if my name ends in an i) Kelli- the old one with an i, living on Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
> and Kelly's house was across the street.

**Don't I WISH! <G>

**~Kelly



Yeah, I was thinking the same thing, (even if my name ends in an i)



Kelli- the old one with an i, living on Unschooling Avenue with all my unschooling neighbors. Yes,,,one can dream.

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/31/2003 6:09:59 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Not because it was
> educational or required or the movie wasn't over yet, because we were ten
> yards from all of Holly's toys, twenty yards from a swingset on a nice day,
>
> and Kelly's house was across the street.

Don't I WISH! <G>

~Kelly
